languages.text: Великолепное украшение, подаренное династии фон Валанциус миром Бертоциа в благодарность за спасение от ксеносов. Сия драгоценность столь стара и прекрасна, что считают, будто она была изготовлена еще во времена золотого рассвета Человечества, совершавшего первые отважные шаги по вселенной.

A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.
languages.original_text: Великолепное украшение, подаренное династии фон Валанциус миром Бертоциа в благодарность за спасение от ксеносов. Сия драгоценность столь стара и прекрасна, что считают, будто она была изготовлена еще во времена золотого рассвета Человечества, совершавшего первые отважные шаги по вселенной.

traits.locale_text: A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House Von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.

A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House Von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.

A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House Von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.

A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.

languages.text: 一件华丽的珠宝，是贝托西亚行星送给冯·瓦兰修斯家族的礼物，感谢行商浪人将那颗行星从异形手中拯救出来。这件珍贵的珠宝年代久远，美轮美奂，据说是在人类的黄金黎明时代制作出来的。那个时候，人类才刚刚勇敢地踏上通往宇宙的征途。
languages.original_text: A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.

traits.locale_text: 一件华丽的珠宝，是贝托西亚行星送给冯·瓦兰修斯家族的礼物，感谢行商浪人将那颗行星从异形手中拯救出来。这件珍贵的珠宝年代久远，美轮美奂，据说是在人类的黄金黎明时代制作出来的。那个时候，人类才刚刚勇敢地踏上通往宇宙的征途。

languages.text: 異種族の手から救出してくれたことに感謝し、惑星ベルトシアからフォン・ヴァランシウス家に贈られた見事な宝飾品。非常に古く美しいもので、人類が宇宙への第一歩を踏み出した黄金の夜明けに作られたと信じられている。
languages.original_text: A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.

traits.locale_text: 異種族の手から救出してくれたことに感謝し、惑星ベルトシアからフォン・ヴァランシウス家に贈られた見事な宝飾品。非常に古く美しいもので、人類が宇宙への第一歩を踏み出した黄金の夜明けに作られたと信じられている。

languages.text: Una magnífica joya otorgada a la casa von Valancius por el planeta Bertocia como agradecimiento por salvarlo de los xenos. Esta alhaja es tan antigua que podría datar de la edad de oro de la Humanidad, cuando los humanos dieron sus primeros pasos en el universo.
languages.original_text: A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.

traits.locale_text: Una magnífica joya otorgada a la casa von Valancius por el planeta Bertocia como agradecimiento por salvarlo de los xenos. Esta alhaja es tan antigua que podría datar de la edad de oro de la Humanidad, cuando los humanos dieron sus primeros pasos en el universo.

languages.text: Un bijou magnifique offert à la maison von Valancius par la planète Bertocia pour la remercier de l'avoir sauvée des xénos. Cette antiquité est si belle et ancienne que l'on estime qu'elle remonterait à l'aube dorée de la civilisation, lorsque les humains ont vaillamment commencé à explorer l'univers.
languages.original_text: A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.

traits.locale_text: Un bijou magnifique offert à la maison von Valancius par la planète Bertocia pour la remercier de l'avoir sauvée des xénos. Cette antiquité est si belle et ancienne que l'on estime qu'elle remonterait à l'aube dorée de la civilisation, lorsque les humains ont vaillamment commencé à explorer l'univers.

languages.text: Ein prächtiger Schmuck, der dem Haus von Valancius vom Planeten Bertocia als Dank für seine Rettung vor den Xenos überreicht wurde. Dieser kostbare Gegenstand ist so alt und schön, dass manche sogar glauben, er sei während des goldenen Beginn der Menschheit gefertigt worden, als die Menschen ihre ersten mutigen Schritte ins Universum wagten.
languages.original_text: A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.

traits.locale_text: Ein prächtiger Schmuck, der dem Haus von Valancius vom Planeten Bertocia als Dank für seine Rettung vor den Xenos überreicht wurde. Dieser kostbare Gegenstand ist so alt und schön, dass manche sogar glauben, er sei während des goldenen Beginn der Menschheit gefertigt worden, als die Menschen ihre ersten mutigen Schritte ins Universum wagten.

languages.text: Bertocia gezegeni tarafından, onu zenolardan kurtardığı için von Valancius Hanesi'ne verilen, görkemli bir mücevher. O kadar eski ve güzel bir parça ki, İnsanlığın altın şafağında, insanlık evrene ilk kez adım attığı sıralarda yapıldığına inanılıyor.
languages.original_text: A magnificent piece of jewellery given to House von Valancius by the planet Bertocia in thanks for its rescue from xenos. The precious article is so old and beautiful that it is believed to have been made during the golden dawn of Mankind, when humans took their first valiant steps out into the universe.

traits.locale_text: Bertocia gezegeni tarafından, onu zenolardan kurtardığı için von Valancius Hanesi'ne verilen, görkemli bir mücevher. O kadar eski ve güzel bir parça ki, İnsanlığın altın şafağında, insanlık evrene ilk kez adım attığı sıralarda yapıldığına inanılıyor.
